lead_paragraph: The resignation of Jason Lieb, a prominent molecular biologist, comes amid complaints about how universities handle sexual harassment in their science departments.

headline.print_headline: Chicago Professor Resigns Amid Sexual Misconduct Investigation
headline.main: Chicago Professor Resigns Amid Sexual Misconduct Investigation

snippet: The resignation of Jason Lieb, a prominent molecular biologist, comes amid complaints about how universities handle sexual harassment in their science departments.
abstract: Prof Jason Lieb, noted molecular biologist at University of Chicago, resigns following formal recommendation of termination after he made unwelcome sexual advances to female graduate students at off-campus event; resignation comes as universities face requests to be more transparent about sexual harassment in their science departments, where women hold only 25 percent of senior faculty jobs.
